scripts.clean: turbo run clean && pnpm dlx rimraf node_modules
scripts.docker:shell: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev sh
scripts.docker:format: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev pnpm turbo format
scripts.docker:lint: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev pnpm turbo lint
scripts.docker:typecheck: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev pnpm turbo typecheck
scripts.docker:app:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev pnpm turbo build
scripts.docker:test: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev pnpm turbo test
scripts.docker:quality: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec dev sh -lc "pnpm turbo format && pnpm turbo lint && pnpm turbo typecheck && pnpm turbo build && pnpm turbo test"
